name: There and BACK (Bioinvasion)
description:
This is a simple puzzle-platformer game made in one week for the VimJam. 

You play as a cube that has to collect chips and put in their base. When this happens, the world starts corrupting and everithing goes wrong.

Move with a and d or the arrows and jump with space.

The music is a remix made by me of the Russian popular song Polyushka Polye.

This is my first game jam and my third playable game made with Unity.

I didn't have the time to finish all the levels that I wanted to make, the pause menu and the win/final screen. I also had trouble exporting the music and it have silences just in the middle of the track.
